text.div:
Query Requester CapabilityStatement

  • Implementation Guide Version: 1.0.0
  • FHIR Version: 4.0.1
  • Supported formats: xml, json
  • Published: 2020-07-30
  • Published by: HL7 International - Infrastructure and Messaging Work Group

This CapabilityStatement describes the expected capabilities of a client that is capable of responding a Da Vinci Notification with a follow up FHIR RESTful query to the Sender. These expectations are the same as described in the HL7 FHIR® US Core Implementation Guide STU3 Release 3.1.1 CapabiltyStatement for the US Core Client

SHALL Support the Following Implementation Guides:

  • http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.us.core|3.1.1

FHIR RESTful Capabilities

Refer to the HL7 FHIR® US Core Implementation Guide STU3 Release 3.1.0 CapabiltyStatement for the US Core Client
